name: Rhythm Life
description:
Get ready for the challenge! Dive into the rhythm, break free from nobody, start from scratch without fearing hardships, and climb to the top step by step!

In this world everything is filled with rhythm. You, with your desire for success, must seize the opportunity, overcome various obstacles on the path of life, and achieve your dream.

Choose From Three Life Paths:

  • Gangster: Begin as an insignificant henchman on the streets and rise to become a godfather who commands the ins and outs of the underworld!
  • Engineer: Start as a diligent worker on the assembly line and ascend to become a super engineer leading fleets into the vastness of space!
  • Chef: Kick off your journey as an apprentice, chopping wood and vegetables and grow into a world-renowned top food tycoon through hard work！

Game Features:

  • Diverse Careers: Players can experience various fun job tasks and their corresponding scene!
  • Difficulty Levels: Suitable for all skill levels, with rhythmic challenges that are easy to pick up but hard to master!
  • Stylish Presentation: Put on your VR and step into a cute rhythmic world!

Follow the Rhythm, Move Your Hands!
Confront the Life With Courage!
